nl.esciencecenter.eecology.classification.featureextraction.featureextractors

Class PitchFeatureExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.eecology.classification.featureextraction.FeatureExtractor
      • nl.esciencecenter.eecology.classification.featureextraction.featureextractors.PitchFeatureExtractor

  • public class PitchFeatureExtractor
extends FeatureExtractor
    Calculates the pitch feature for the double matrices x, y, z comprising 3-axial data.
    Since:
    July 2014
    Author:
    Elena Ranguelova

    • Method Detail

      • extractFeatures

        public org.jblas.DoubleMatrix extractFeatures(nl.esciencecenter.eecology.classification.featureextraction.FormattedSegments dataForInstances)
        Calculates the pitch feature using DoubleMatrix type.

        The formula for the pitch is pitch = (atan(x./sqrt(y.^2+z.^2))*180)/pi.

        Specified by:
        extractFeatures in class FeatureExtractor
        Returns:

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Description copied from class: FeatureExtractor
        Gets the name of the feature. This name is used to identify the feature by in the config/properties file.
        Specified by:
        getName in class FeatureExtractor
